extendedInfo.description: Boss, it's time to open!Run your very own restaurant in famous cities around the world with your manager (now with voice support) by your side!As CEO you can hire employees, cook, and decorate your restaurant!Open your restaurant in famous cities! Cute graphics, optimized controls for smartphones, and a management system which players of all ages can enjoy!Make the best restaurant in the world!â English Support! â My Restaurant also supports íêµ­ì´, Deutsch, franÃ§ais, æ¥æ¬èª, ä¸­æç®ä½ and ä¸­æç¹é«.â â¡â â¡â  Game Introduction â â¡â â¡â â Run a RestaurantHire employees, cook, and decorate!As CEO, you can do so much for your restaurant.Run things in your unique management style!â Open in famous cities all over the worldSeoul? Paris? Las Vegas? Venice? Open your restaurant in any city you want!Enjoy each cityâs theme and music! Itâll be like you are actually there!  â Manager system to assists you as a CEORunning a restaurant is difficult, you say? Donât worry!As CEO, youâll have a manager helping you!Your manager can assist you with 50 different management lessons!Youâll be a true CEO in no time! â Develop your own managerYou can develop 8 unique managers! They will demonstrate different skills depending on the choices you make!â Talking Manager"Can you hear my voice?"You will feel closer to your managers because they can speak to you with real voice support! â Dress up your employeesDress up your employees any way you'd like with 100 different items!Increase efficiency and serve more customers!â Meet FriendsWant to know who cares about you the most?Go to My Room and check your popularity!Look for the friends who have given you the most affection through the intimacy menu!ââââââââââââââââCom2uS: Your first search for fun!Check out these other exciting games by Com2uS!âââââââââââââââGolf Starâ¢: Experience the most vivid game of golf ever!Tiny Pop: A new super exciting bubble shooter!9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball: The Ultimate Baseball game!Tiny Farm: A Tiny Farm right in the palm of your hands!Heroes Warâ¢: Assemble the ultimate force of heroes to save the world!Other fun and exciting games are available, too!ââââââââââââââââPLAY WITH Com2uS!!ââââââââââââââââFollow us!twitter.com/Com2uSLike us on Facebook!facebook.com/Com2uSTips and Updateswww.com2us.com

reviews.title: Wasted game
reviews.comment: I almost apporved of it my only dissapointment is i cannot expand my restaurant. And even though i joined thier club to be able to invite friends they dont alow me and always insist tha i should signed up again so i decide to uninstall the game unless you can fix the system. So the game can acnolage me as a memeber and i can expand my restaurant and invite friends hope u can fix this as well as to level up the chefs a little faster to be able to cook the other dishes ill be waiting
reviews.author: Isaac Atienza

reviews.title: Won\'t load :(
reviews.comment: I downloaded this cause the concept was a bit different. But it will not load. Just keeps saying checking for update.. Then says resource download. Saddly no matter how many times i try it keeps on doing the same so let me know when it is fixed then i will re-download.
reviews.author: Jannice W.

reviews.title: Game issues
reviews.comment: Every time I\'ve played, the game will suddenly reload itself to the last time I saved. I can\'t get further into the game without doing the same things over and over again. I\'ll uninstall this game because it has become unplayable for me.
reviews.author: Maddie Jones

reviews.title: Best restaurant game ever!!!
reviews.comment: I really love this restaurant game but there were bugs in it... Please fix it as fast as possible!!!
reviews.author: Lee Oon keng

reviews.title: DX
reviews.comment: It\'s a really good game; I was having a good time with it as well. But by the time I became a level 9 it keeps closing and saying that its been forced closed! :( please fix...!
reviews.author: Alyx Nichole

reviews.title: i have a complain
reviews.comment: Whenever i exit the game and return back they show my food is spoilt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No progress! !!
reviews.comment: After I start cooking it will put me back to lvl three and I have to start buying stuff and waiters all over again. Very annoying plz fix this!!!
reviews.author: Brittany Gresham

reviews.title: yow com2us hub !
reviews.comment: .. I rated it even I was downloading it because I knew that com2us games are great especially inotia. thumbs up !^^
reviews.author: Wex Buagas

reviews.title: Ffffuuuuuu
reviews.comment: A forever resource download.. Com2us please fix these. It looks cool. \"EDIT\" Still NO UPDATE!!!
reviews.author: Emmanuel Marabillo

reviews.title: Guest log in
reviews.comment: After installed it, guest log in button unable. Why?
reviews.author: James Tan

reviews.title: BUG
reviews.comment: I gather like 150k coins, and then my phone accidently restarted, when I open the game back, All reseted, like going back to 96k coins, pls fix that, I\'m so suprised that time. I\'m just like going to gave up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What its wrong with this app?  waited 30 minutes to  install and now it won\'t even open please fix it looks like it might be a fun game, INSTALLING DON\'T WASTE YOUR TIME!!
reviews.author: Charlotte McCombs

reviews.title: The glitch was great only for a little while
reviews.comment: Taking advantage of the glitch at first was nice, leveling up my dishes like nothing. Now im all out of 4hr+ dishes to level. Hopefully an update comes quickly!
reviews.author: Veronica Lynch

reviews.title: problems
reviews.comment: This game was great before and I was totally addicted. but ever since the new patch theres been so many glitches.....and its just become unenjoyable. i put on 12 hour food and I have a 24 hour wait for my manager and i quitt and come back in after apx. 3 seconds and the food is done and the manager has 9 hours left. please fix asap because I really love this game.
reviews.author: Angel Caine

reviews.title: Awesome games
reviews.comment: Good job! More updates please. Tnx
reviews.author: Pierce Go

reviews.title: Alcatel onetouch 903
reviews.comment: Downloaded keeps f.c .. where can u find a decent cafe or resturant game dat works
reviews.author: Deezer Geezer

reviews.title: Cooking times are messed up
reviews.comment: Dish cooking times seem to be messed up. Something which takes 2 hours is burned when I check back 1 hour later. And something which takes 3 hours was done in under 1 hour. Game is pretty much unplayable because of this.
reviews.author: Giovannie Verstraten

reviews.title: Could be better .....
reviews.comment: As the title said ... could be better if not because of some awful bugs. Food ruined if you come back from visiting friend\'s restaurant ! LAME ! Other than that, never ending lags n especially Disconnect popup message ! ANNOYING !!!!! PLEASE FIX ASAP !!!!!
reviews.author: Kiyoshi Kazuki

reviews.title: Please!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Hi~ im not sure if it had updated or not after the bug ive takked abiut so im just say in once more.. so I found out that when I cook something and I went back to homescreen then the reminder of the food is ready but its actually not.. its like when I go back to my homescreen the time that took the food to be ready went frozen. Which is troublesome because I need to keep the app on the screen for it be able to cook something.... please fix it... im not sure if its me or not......
reviews.author: Chuu Taku

reviews.title: I LOVED IT!But...
reviews.comment: Okaay, so u fixed the manager problem...but what about the instantly spoiled food when u exit the game and come back not 5 minutes later?please fix...again....seriously this game was great but they missed the main problem.
reviews.author: Jade Francis
